name: assignee_data_bot
description: True/False if the assignee is a bot or not.

name: assignee_data_domain
description: Assignee's domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: assignee_data_org_name
description: Assignee's organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_bot
description: True/False if the author is a bot or not.

name: author_domain
description: Author's domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_org_name
description: Author's organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: comment_updated_at
description: Date when the comment was updated.

name: github_repo
description: The name of the GitHub repository.

name: is_github_issue
description: Used to separate issues from comments.

name: is_github_issue_comment
description: Used to separate comments from issues.

name: is_github_comment
description: Used to unify pull request and issue comments.

name: issue_closed_at
description: Date when an issue was closed.

name: issue_created_at
description: Date when an issue was opened.

name: issue_id_in_repo
description: The issue's ID in the repository.

name: issue_labels
description: The labels assigned to an issue.

name: issue_pull_request
description: True if the issue is a pull request.

name: issue_updated_at
description: Date when the issue was last updated.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the data were enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in ElasticSearch raw index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: origin
description: The original URL from which the repository was retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Used if more than one project levels are allowed in the project hierarchy.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: time_open_days
description: Time the item is open counted in days.

name: time_to_close_days
description: Time to close an issue counted in days.

name: time_to_first_attention
description: Time to first attention to an issue counted in days.

name: issue_title_analyzed
description: Issue title split by terms to allow searching.

name: user_data_bot
description: True/False if the user is a bot or not.

name: user_data_domain
description: User's domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_org_name
description: User's organization name from SortingHat profile.
